attributes.action: Recep Tayyip Erdogan should be arrested for the war crimes against Native Kurds
attributes.additional_details: Recep Tayyip Erdogan triggers a campaign where he target a racial discrimination propaganda in Turkey by calling PKK (Kurdistan  Workers Party) and the entire Native civilian Kurds for Terrorists. PKK was created in Kurdistan Region in 1978 as self defence against the Turkish Terror. Native Kurds are stateless people who have been victim of Racism, Tyranny and Terror through the history for their Native ethnicity. They are being attacked both by ISIS and Turkey today with Recep Tayyip Erdogan in the lead.
attributes.background: More than 30% of population in Turkey have Native Kurdish origin, they have always been victim of racism in Turkey. Basic needs was always deprived from them as access to water and electricity which left most of them in poverty and today they make the largest ethnic group of racial discrimination.

rejection.details: You could start a petition asking for the UK Government to urge the Turkish Government to take steps to protect the rights of the Kurds.
